trans-unit.source: A fully featured modbus protocol stack in python
trans-unit.target: 一个功能齐全的python modbus协议栈。

trans-unit.source: A number of backing contexts (database, redis, a slave device)
trans-unit.target: 一些备份上下文(数据库、redis、一个从属设备)。

trans-unit.source: Also, if you have questions, please ask them on the mailing list so that others can benefit from the results and so that I can trace them. Also you can write to issue tracker.
trans-unit.target: Also, if you have questions, please ask them on the mailing list so that others can benefit from the results and so that I can trace them. Also you can write to issue tracker.

trans-unit.source: Although most system administrators will find little need for a Modbus server on any modern hardware, they may find the need to query devices on their network for status (PDU, PDR, UPS, etc). Since the library is written in python, it allows for easy scripting and/or integration into their existing solutions.
trans-unit.target: 虽然大多数系统管理员会发现在任何现代硬件上几乎不需要Modbus服务器,但他们可能会发现需要查询网络上的设备状态(PDU、PDR、UPS等)。由于该库是用Python编写的,因此可以很容易地编写脚本和/或集成到他们现有的解决方案中。

trans-unit.source: Architecture documentation
trans-unit.target: 文件架构

trans-unit.source: Can function as a fully implemented modbus server
trans-unit.target: 可以作为一个完全实现的modbus服务器使用

trans-unit.source: Client Features
trans-unit.target: 客户特点

trans-unit.source: Continuing, most monitoring software needs to be stress tested against hundreds or even thousands of devices (why this was originally written), but getting access to that many is unwieldy at best. The pymodbus3 server will allow a user to test as many devices as their base operating system will allow (allow in this case means how many Virtual IP addresses are allowed).
trans-unit.target: Continuing, most monitoring software needs to be stress tested against hundreds or even thousands of devices (why this was originally written), but getting access to that many is unwieldy at best. The pymodbus3 server will allow a user to test as many devices as their base operating system will allow (allow in this case means how many Virtual IP addresses are allowed).

trans-unit.target: For more information please browse the project documentation.

trans-unit.source: For those of you that just want to get started fast, here you go:
trans-unit.target: 对于那些只想快速上手的人来说,你来了。

trans-unit.source: Full read/write protocol on discrete and register
trans-unit.target: 分立和寄存器的全读/写协议

trans-unit.source: Full server control context (device information, counters, etc)
trans-unit.target: 完整的服务器控制上下文(设备信息、计数器等)

trans-unit.source: Functional testing against any reference I can find
trans-unit.target: 对照我所能找到的任何参考资料进行功能测试

trans-unit.source: Hynek Petrak <hynek@swac.cz>
trans-unit.target: Hynek Petrak <hynek@swac.cz>

trans-unit.source: If you would like to install pymodbus3 without the twisted dependency, simply edit the setup.py file before running easy_install and comment out all mentions of twisted. It should be noted that without twisted, one will only be able to run the synchronized version as the asynchronous versions uses twisted for its event loop.
trans-unit.target: 如果你想在不依赖 twisted 的情况下安装 pymodbus3,只需在运行 easy_install 之前编辑 setup.py 文件,并注释掉所有提到 twisted 的地方。需要注意的是,如果没有 twisted,你只能运行同步版本,因为异步版本的事件循环使用 twisted。

trans-unit.source: Payload builder/decoder utilities
trans-unit.target: 有效载荷生成器/解码器实用程序

trans-unit.source: Pymodbus is a full Modbus protocol implementation using twisted for its asynchronous communications core. It can also be used without any third party dependencies (aside from pyserial) if a more lightweight project is needed.
trans-unit.target: Pymodbus是一个完整的Modbus协议实现,其异步通信核心使用twisted。如果需要更轻量级的项目,它也可以不依赖任何第三方(除了pyserial)。

trans-unit.source: Pymodbus is built on top of code developed from/by:
trans-unit.target: Pymodbus是建立在从/by开发的代码之上。

trans-unit.source: Released under the BSD License
trans-unit.target: 采用BSD许可证发布
